description:
Hey there! This game is still in development! Enjoy this demo!

Developed for Rainbow Jam 2017! Fall in love with the biker babe of your dreams!

_____________________________________________________________________________________________

CURRENT BUGS:

-Playing at fullscreen may cause sprites to draw over the scene. I highly recommend playing at its default size.
